name: Professional Cuddler
description:
Hello! here is my final project for my GD105 class.  I call it Professional Cuddler. Our task was to make a game using all that we learned this semester. The game had 2 main restrictions. One it had to revolve around a theme and two it needed to feature a specific animal. My animal was the Alaskan Bull Worm, there is no such thing in real life, so I researched the closest animal i could find. The Bobbit worm. Bobbit worms are fascinating creatures.  As the title says, my theme was Professional cuddling. I chose this because I know that not many people would want to cuddle a worm.

How to play

My game has four levels, in level one and 3, you use your mouse to control where the worm goes. In levels 2 and 4, you use the spacebar to try and grab fishes to eat. Hold the spacebar down makes the worm go higher.

Assets

Here are some of the artworks that I made for the game. I made all of these with Piskel.

A blue fish

A red fish

A purple fish

And Bobby the Bobbit himself!
